name: Successful query of a user for his id

children.description: Given that the Analyst has access to the API
When he makes the query of a user for his id 2
Analyst consult a user
Analyst executes a GET on the resource /users/{id}
GET https://reqres.in/api/users/2

children.description: Then he should see the successful response code 200
Then the response code obtained should be (200)
And that the response contains the id 2 and email janet.weaver@reqres.in fields
Then el id del usuario should be (2)
Then el email del usuario should be 'janet.weaver@reqres.in'

userStory.storyName: Consult of a user in the reqres.in API
userStory.narrative:
As a Certification Analyst for Reqres.in
  I need to test the consult user functionality
  to validate its correct operation

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
When he makes the query of a user for his id <userID>
Then he should see the successful response code <responseCode>
And that the response contains the id <userID> and email <email> fields
